extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the serial numbers present on the machine for OmniGraffle.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh if [ -d "/Library/Application Support/Omni Group/Software Licenses/" ]; then result=`cat /Library/Application\ Support/Omni\ Group/Software\ Licenses/OmniGraffle*.omnilicense | grep -A 1 Key | grep string | sed 's/<string>//g' | sed 's/<\/string>//g' | awk '{print $1}'` fi echo "<result>$result</result>"
